document.full_text: twelve sudanese aid workers taken hostage by refugees this week in the volatile kalma camp in darfur have been released, a spokesman for the u.n.-african union peacekeeping mission unamid said on thursday.
document.title: aid workers taken hostage in darfur freed: u.n.
lines_and_colors: twelve sudanese aid workers taken hostage by refugees this week in the volatile kalma camp in darfur have been released, a spokesman for the u.n.-african union peacekeeping mission unamid said on thursday.
